derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Greek, neuter of argos 'idle', from a- 'without' + ergon 'work'

entry.def: Argon is an inert gas which exists in very small amounts in the atmosphere. It is used in electric lights.

means.word_mean: 1. a colorless and odorless inert gas; one of the six inert gases; comprises approximately 1% of the earth's atmosphere
